title: Out of sync: failed to remove dirs, files on winxp (busy error)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Hi All! Thanks for the great Sync thing!

But I am experiencing an "Out of sync" problem on my Win XP box after upgrade from 0.11.25 to 0.12.4 (please see the log below). Other boxes (Linux, Win7, Win7, Android) in the domain has upgraded fine. What can cause this "Busy" error? There is no any other activity with these files.

[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 rwfolder.go:257: DEBUG: rwFolder/default@0x1f446f00 changed 3
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 rwfolder.go:287: INFO: Folder "default" isn't making progress. Pausing puller for 1m0s.
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 rwfolder.go:288: DEBUG: rwFolder/default@0x1f446f00 next pull in 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:144: DEBUG: log 1517 FolderErrors map[folder:default errors:[{test remove \?\H:\Sync\test: Процесс не может получить доступ к файлу, так как этот файл занят другим процессом.} {test-vdvp remove \?\H:\Sync\test-vdvp: Процесс не может получить доступ к файлу, так как этот файл занят другим процессом.} {test2 remove \?\H:\Sync\test2: Процесс не может получить доступ к файлу, так как этот файл занят другим процессом.}]]
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:144: DEBUG: log 1518 StateChanged map[duration:0.125 folder:default to:idle from:syncing]
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s
[3JIVD] 2015/11/26 15:55:34.515625 events.go:206: DEBUG: poll 1m0s

The localized error message above says "the file is busy".
